resources.string: Account Registration: You must create an account to use the full features of GetGo. You are responsible for the security of your account.
Age Requirement: You must be at least 18 years old to use this application or have the consent of a parent or legal guardian.
Provide Accurate Information: You agree to provide accurate and complete information when registering and using our services.
Respect Intellectual Property Rights: You may not copy, modify, distribute, sell, or lease any part of our service or software.
User Content: You are responsible for any content you upload or create on the application. You agree not to post content that violates the law or the rights of others.
